question: Sultan Alauddin Khilji attacked and captured Chittorgarh in Mewar, Rajasthan and changed its' name as
explanation: In 1303, Sultan Alauddin Khilji attacked and captured Chittorgarh in Mewar, Rajasthan. Khizr khan, the eldest son of Alauddin Khilji, was made the governor of Chittor and on his name Chittor was renamed as Khizarabad.
